function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of COVID-19 from suppliers delivering materials to construction sites.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 exposure for site office staff members and suppliers.","Mitigation":"Implement strict protocols for material delivery, including hygiene and social distancing measures.","Technologies":"Digital tracking systems for contact tracing, virtual communication tools for supplier engagement.","People":"Suppliers, site office staff members","Owner":"Construction project managers"},{"Description":"Reduced workforce on site may impact the ability to deliver projects as promised, leading to potential delays and client dissatisfaction.","Impact":"Loss of confidence from clients and disruption to the supply chain.","Mitigation":"Implement safety measures to maintain workforce well-being, provide key worker status for essential on-site personnel.","Technologies":"Remote communication tools for client engagement, virtual project management platforms for monitoring progress.","People":"Clients, site engineers, site office staff members","Owner":"Construction project managers"}]}
